titles.title: Terra Formars: Revenge
Terraformars S2
Тераформарс: Отмъщение
テラフォーマーズ リベンジ
Terraformars: Revenge
테라포마스: 리벤지
火星异种 REVENGE

anime.description: With Earth becoming increasingly overpopulated, an ambitious plan has been put into place to terraform Mars using mold and cockroaches. Nearly 500 years after the plan, a mission to Mars, Annex 1, is under way to accomplish crucial research into the Virus currently plaguing mankind with the crew members who`ve been injected with various DNA of life on Earth in order to combat the Terraformars, giant humanoid cockroaches. Source: crunchyroll

tag.name: seinen
tag.description: Seinen, literally "young man", is one of the main demographic classifications applied to manga, and, by extension, to anime, especially manga-based ones. As the name implies, seinen works are marketed primarily to an audience of young men; the age range commonly understood to be the target of such works goes roughly from 17 to somewhere in the 40s.

tag.name: target audience
tag.description: Anime, like everything else in the modern world, is targeted towards specific audiences, both implicitly by the creators and overtly by the marketing. While categories are associated with specific sex and age groups, this is not a bar on the anime being enjoyed by people who don`t fit into that band; not only do crossover titles exist, but the categories also have a considerable following outside their main demographic, and a person might as well enjoy anime from all categories. Still, does not invalidate the usefulness of marking a title as one of the categories; the same themes will likely be treated differently in anime geared for different audiences. Only one should not jump the gun and assume that a title will be more or less serious or present content in this or that way due to its target audience, or conversely assume the target audience on the content and its presentation alone. As such, the audience categories help form a broad impression of how a title might work with the announced themes, but offer little to no in-depth information about specific content or its treatment. The audience categories originate from manga magazines, which group titles of a same intended audience into a magazine that is advertised as belonging to that category, and so manga-based anime will have the category from their parent work. As for anime based on other works, the audience is often debatable, but comparing information such as time slot to the manga-based anime generally helps figure out the most likely possibility. If the parent material was classified under multiple audiences over time (for example, it was originally shounen, but then as the plot changed and became more mature, it was reclassified as seinen), and the anime adapts parent material time periods covering multiple audiences, we tag all audiences covered by the anime adaptation.

tag.name: original work
tag.description: What the anime is based on! This is given as the original work credit in the OP. Mostly of academic interest, but a useful bit of info, hinting at the possible depth of story.

tag.name: manga
tag.description: Manga is the lifeblood that drives the anime industry. Everything and its mother is based on manga. However! There are exceptions where the manga was not the basis for the anime. It`s common practice to make manga adaptations of many popular anime, there`s a manga based on Evangelion, and two (one shounen and one shoujo) based on each of Escaflowne and Mahou Tsukai Tai. Also it`s quite common to release manga and anime versions of a story in parallel, for instance Nadesico and Shoujo Kakumei Utena. There are also cases where an anime continues in a manga, as in the case of Angel Beats! and Angel Beats: Heaven`s Door, or reverse. See also http://anidb.net/t6493 [manhua] and http://anidb.net/t5010 [manhwa].

character.name: Petra Eheim
character.description: Petra Eheim is the Chancellor of Germany in 2620.

character.name: Luke Snorresson
character.description: Luke Snorresson is the President of the Roma Federation in 2620.

character.name: Gerald Goodman
character.description: Goodman is the President of U.S.A. in 2620.

character.name: U-NASA
character.description: United Nations Aeronautics and Space Administration (U-NASA) is the international agency responsible for international space programs and in charge of the Terraforming project to make Mars suitable for humans to live. The main building is located in Washington D.C., with 5 other branches in Russia, China, Japan, Roman Federation and Germany.

character.name: Annex I
character.description: Annex 1, formally known as BUGS3, is large spacecraft with 100 crew members.

character.name: Annex1 No.2 Division
character.description: No.2 Division is Nippo-American Alliance squad.

character.name: Terraformar
character.description: Terraformars are evolved humanoid cockroaches who live on Mars. They possess immense strength and endurance and a normal human is no match for them. They also appear to be somewhat intelligent and have a natural hate for humans.

character.name: Liu Zhou
character.description: The head of the U-NASA 4th Branch, China.

character.name: Bladimir A. Smiles
character.description: The president of Russia in 2620 and head of U-NASA 3rd Branch.

episode.title: TRIPLE COMBAT 三つ巴
Triple Combat: Three-way
Affrontement à trois
Triple Combat: Mitsudomoe
episode.summary: The battle between humans is interrupted by a horde of thousands of angry aliens. Will the crew of Annex 1 be able to work together long enough to survive the onslaught of a new Terraformar general? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: FRIEND HERE 同盟見参
Friend Here: An Alliance Appears
Rencontre alliée
Friend Here: Doumei Kenzan
episode.summary: The No. 1 and No. 2 divisions have walked into a trap set by the Chinese team. They manage to neutralize the Chinese` superior weaponry, but they still have a few tricks up their sleeve, and their transforming power is greater than it may appear! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: CENTURY OF RAISING ARMS 怒りの艦長
Century of Raising Arms: The Captain`s Rage
La colère du capitaine
Century of Raising Arms: Ikari no Kanchou
episode.summary: No. 4 Division gets to the main ship, but finds they`ve walked into a trap. The Chinese division has betrayed them, and wants the two post-surgery humans as experimental samples. The Chinese have brought weapons, which they use to slaughter the Terraformars by the hundreds. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 2ND GENERATION 特別な二人
2nd Generation: The Special Two
Le duo exceptionnel
2nd Generation: Tokubetsu na Futari
episode.summary: 2620 AD. Humanity tried a terraforming project on Mars, which lead to super evolved roaches, as well as the Alien Engine virus, which has a 100% death rate. To break through this nightmare, a crew that had undergone a special surgery has been sent to Mars. Hizamaru Akari and Michelle K. Davis lead crew members with special powers to try to resolve both of these issues. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: WEB OF BEND 猟師の網
Web of Bend: Hunter`s Net
Le filet du chasseur
Web of Bend: Ryoushi no Ami
episode.summary: Michelle and Akari are kidnapped by Bao from No. 4 division. He tries to take them back to Annex 1, but to get there, he`ll have to break through a horde of thousands of Terraformars. He decides to sacrifice Yaeko to get away. Will her non-combatant rank powers be enough to hold off the swarm? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: HAPPY BIRTHDAY 最初の一日
Happy Birthday: The First Day
Le premier jour
Happy Birthday: Saisho no Ichinichi
episode.summary: Michelle and Hizamaru use their unique weapons to defeat the Terraformars who possess the powers of the former crew. Will their Ninja-vibro-blades and acceleration-boosted martial arts be enough to stand up against the superpowered Terraformars? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: STRATEGY AND TACTICS 武器と術
Strategy and Tactics: Weapons and Techniques
Statégie et armement
Strategy and Tactics: Buki to Jutsu
episode.summary: Separated from the group, Michelle and Hizamaru are attacked by Terraformars using the powers of the other Mosaic operation subjects who died. Overwhelmed and outmatched, their only hope is to use a cunning plan to trick No. 4 division into destroying their foes for them. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: MAN ON A MISSION 兵士と父親
Man on a Mission: Soldier and Father
Le père et le soldat
Man on a Mission: Heishi to Chichioya
episode.summary: The Chinese division has revealed their ultimate weapon: a girl with an anthrax surgery base. Unless she`s killed, there is no hope of defeating them and reclaiming Annex 1. Alexander goes in alone into the anthrax-covered spaceship to assassinate her. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: STRENGTH OF WEAKEST 持たざる者の魂
Strength of Weakest: The Soul of the Weakest
L`âme de ceux qui n`ont rien
Strength of Weakest: Motazaru Mono no Tamashii
episode.summary: The battle for the broadcast tower rages on as the civilian crew of No. 1 division infiltrates the control room. But the Terraformars are there two! If they make any noise the trained killers of No. 4 Division will hear them, so they`re forced to continue their work in total silence as the killer cockroaches get every closer... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: SILENCE OR VIOLENCE 不言の拳
Silence or Violence: Silent Fists
Le poing du silence
Silence or Violence: Fugen no Ken
episode.summary: The engineering team continues its strike on Annex 1, but the Terraformars have infiltrated the ship as well. With foes on all sides, both human and inhuman, will they be able to make their way to the control room and alert Earth to No. 4 Division`s treachery? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: NO PLACE TO HIDE 群体
No Place to Hide: Colony
La colonie
No Place to Hide: Guntai
episode.summary: The engineering team, led by a few lower-ranking combat soldiers, mounts a desperate assault on the bioweapon-infested Annex 1. The Terraformars attack at the same time, making for a disastrous 3-way battle. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: THE FOREMOST 首位
The Foremost: The Leader
Le premier du classement
The Foremost: Shui
episode.summary: The mighty rank 1, Joseph G. Newton, arrives to save Yaeko from the horde! He easily dispatches Bao and rescues Akari and Michelle. But will he be able to achieve his greatest objective... and win Michelle`s heart? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: THE 12 SECONDS 12秒の革命
The 12 Seconds: 12 Second Revolution
Révolution en 12 secondes
The 12 Seconds: 12 Byou no Kakumei
episode.summary: The heroic sacrifice of the civilian crew allows No.1 and No. 2 division to temporarily take back control of the communications tower. But the last member of the crew passes out before she can tell Earth about No. 4 division`s betrayal. Is all hope lost, or is there another way? Source: crunchyroll
